name: The Unavoidables
description:
The Unavoidables

The Unavoidables is a ball rolling game that is a submission for Ludum Dare 50 challenge.

Ludum Dare Page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/the-unavoidables

Theme: Delay the Inevitable

Gameplay: There are 5 total levels including the tutorial level. 1st is a tutorial, and the others are game levels. The player-rolling ball will roll forward, there will be obstacles in its way, and you have to move/slide left or right to avoid them and finish the level. The obstacles move left to right in a linear manner, as well as all move back and forth at the same time, so it will feel like they come by fast, or they are sliding forward with the player. Pay attention to their movement and you'll win.

Instructions Windows: Use "A" or "Left Arrow Key" to move left. Use "D" or "Right Arrow Key" to move right.

Instructions WebGL: Use "A" or "Left Arrow Key" to move left. Use "D" or "Right Arrow Key" to move right. Use full screen for better experience.

Instructions Android: Tap on the left side of the screen to move left. Tap on the right side of the screen to move right.

Note.: Controls for android are not well optimized due to the submission period, I'll fix those in the future.

Follow the development log on YouTube.
